titleStmt.title: The constant lover, or, Celia's glory exprest to the life a pleasant new song (as it's sung after the Italian manner) and great in request at court and in the city : to the pleasant new tune of, Why are my eyes still flo----------ing.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
